fixes.name: Claims in Selected Year
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted YEAR([ClaimDate]) to YEAR('customers+'[ClaimDate]) and replaced [Parameters].[select year] with SELECTEDVALUE('select year'[Display As]) per parameter mapping rules. This returns a boolean indicating whether the claim year matches the selected parameter.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
